summary: AC CONDENSER HAS FAILED AND GMC IS UNABLE/UNWILLING TO SUPPLY PARTS FOR REPAIRS.  MY VEHICLE'S PROBLEM WAS IDENTIFIED TWO MONTHS AGO, THE DEALER NOTIFIED ME THAT THE PART IS BACKORDERED AND THERE IS NOT ETA ON THE PART.  THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE BECAUSE WITHOUT AC, THE DEFROSTER DOES NOT WORK, AND THERE IS NO/LIMITED VISIBILITY.
